career.title: Web Application Developer
career.description:
- Developing in JavaScript/TypeScript language

- Development with Angular Framework utilizing Ionic library

- Work in an Agile environment

- Working with CAS as an Authentication layer

- Version control and code contribution with GIT and Bitbucket

career.title: Web Developer
career.description:
- Extensive experience in working with JavaScript

- Development via Angular Framework, pug and Bootstrap 4

- Working with AWS services such as S3, RDS, API GateWay, EC2

- Working with GIT - Bitbucket

- In charge of the development of the Content Management System (CMS).

career.title: Quality Assurance Tester
career.description:
- Assist operations and local quality function in tracking, documenting, and reporting quality.

- Analyze and investigate product complaints or reported quality issues to ensure closure in accordance with company guidelines and external regulatory requirements
